alert.note: Alert for Adams; Scioto (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 27 at 11:49AM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF LEWIS, SOUTHEASTERN ADAMS AND SOUTHWESTERN SCIOTO COUNTIES THROUGH 1230 PM EDT... At 1148 AM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was located over Wallingford, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph, pea size hail, and very heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Hail may cause minor damage to outdoor objects. Visibility will be poor and hydroplaning is possible. Locations impacted include... Vanceburg, Head of Grassy, Camp Dix, Sandy Springs, Buena Vista in Scioto County, Saint Paul, Firebrick, Harris, Kinniconick, Tannery, Epworth, Emerson, Turkey Creek Lake, Ribolt, Friendship, Charters, Garrison, Petersville, Stricklett and Glen Springs. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. Motorists should slow down and use extra caution. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
